channel.title: Osebo // Activity Sheet
channel.description: This is an activity sheet. Quick updates on my design process, projects, workflow and random things that run through my mind

item.title: 01. This is an activity sheet.
item.description:
My previous activity sheet gave me a weird taste in my mouth so I created a new one. Here is a link to the previous one.

Over the weekend Ryan, Sid and I completed our first working version of Rainbow. The experience displays a list of the people the user is following on Soundcloud. When a user selects a person they area able to view their likes. Next we are working on creating our own custom player and building the experience on mobile.
